name: Roux
instructions: Melt 1 part butter in a pan over medium low heat
Sprinkle 1 part flour over the melted butter
Stir butter and flour constantly with a wooden spoon in a figure-eight motion for even cooking
Light Roux: continue mixing for 3-5 minutes until roux is puffed slightly
Brown Roux: continue mixing for 6-7 minutes until roux smells a little nutty and turns pale brown
Dark Roux: continue mixing for 9-15 minutes until roux is as dark as desired
